title: Chris Davis Picks Stocks, Praises Buffett, Rips Politicians
description: The chairman and portfolio manager of Davis Advisors stresses the importance of long-term investing and buying "durable, growing businesses at value prices."
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: The chairman and portfolio manager of Davis Advisors stresses the importance of long-term investing and buying "durable, growing businesses at value prices."
